name: The Last Raccoon (in Space)
description:
There are many dangers in space and hunger is one of them.

Flying through the universe, going for moonwalks and enjoying the nice view of the stars; sounds like living the dream. What could go wrong? The answer is; EVERYTHING! This utopia of a journey did not last forever. Take necessities such as food from the human kind and be welcomed by a raging plague rifling through the ship for filling their stomachs. Unfortunately, a nice little raccoon is the only thing left before turning to cannibalism. But you, the raccoon, need to escape. Choose the right path in order to survive and maybe help a friend out!

Be brave and try hard!

Made by:
Benjamin Hanussek
Pulkit Parashar
Marie Biedermann
Tom Tucek

Source on GitHub:
https://github.com/pulkitparashar7/GSEGameJam
